subs.text: @jeffjedras So far so good. I have a ticket to every home game in April, randomly assigned in the cheap seats. Pretty much right up my alley. I‚Äôll try to go to each game.  Because it‚Äôs so cheap (and I‚Äôm a lapsed fan), I won‚Äôt feel the obligation to stick around for the entirety of each game.

subs.text: Count me as a part-owner of TSS Rovers Football Club. I bought exactly one share, and if I lose my investment, so be it. This feels like something I want to be a part of with a tie back to my home province. Go Rovers Go! @SOTR_Vancouver @swanguardians [link]

subs.text: If there‚Äôs any other sports club that has a 49% fan ownership model in Canada, especially if it has a youth team, and even more especially if it helps support young women and girls in athletics, please let me know. I want to be a part of that.
subs.rawText: If there‚Äôs any other sports club that has a 49% fan ownership model in Canada, especially if it has a youth team, and even more especially if it helps support young women and girls in athletics, please let me know. I want to be a part of that.

subs.text: The 6th wave of the pandemic feels like the ‚Äúeverybody‚Äôs going to eventually get COVID-19 and if not die from it right away, then at least slowly over time as you keep getting it year after year‚Äù phase, but it‚Äôs still not the ‚Äútell your crushes you‚Äôre in love with them‚Äù phase.

subs.text: What if, and hear me out on this, how about instead of demolishing the whole thing, we keep the section between Lawrence East and Scarborough Centre (or, let‚Äôs say, Midland), and the TTC just gives it to me. I‚Äôll automate the system and maintain it. Deal? [link]

subs.text:
@hankgreen I‚Äôll unfollow someone if their last [x] amount of tweets are about a subject that‚Äôs wearing me out. Hopefully someone will RT them into my stream.

I‚Äôll unfollow mean people that I don‚Äôt learn anything from. That said, because you‚Äôre mean isn‚Äôt a sufficient reason to unfollow.
subs.rawText:
@hankgreen I‚Äôll unfollow someone if their last [x] amount of tweets are about a subject that‚Äôs wearing me out. Hopefully someone will RT them into my stream.

I‚Äôll unfollow mean people that I don‚Äôt learn anything from. That said, because you‚Äôre mean isn‚Äôt a sufficient reason to unfollow.
